title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2970/88 of 27 September 1988 re-establishing the levying of customs duties on electric filament lamps, falling within CN code 8539, originating in Romania, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3635/87 apply
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2970/88
of 27 September 1988
re-establishing the levying of customs duties on electric flament lamps, falling within CN code 8539, originating in Romania, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3635/87 apply
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
As from 2 October 1988, the levying of customs duties, suspended pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 3635/87 shall be re-established on imports into the Community of the following products originating in Romania:
1.2.3 //  //  //  // Order No  // CN code   // Description  //  //  //  // 10.1090   // 8539 10 90 8539 21 30 8539 21 91 8539 21 99 8539 22 10 8539 22 90 8539 29 31 8539 29 39 8539 29 91 8539 29 99   // Electric flament lamps, including sealed beam lamp units, excluding those of a kind used for projectors  //    //   //

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 September 1988.
For the Commission
COCKFIELD
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 350, 12. 12. 1987, p. 1.
